dcterms:description: A corpus built by retrieving emotional speech from existing podcast recordings, designed to be naturalistic and emotionally balanced.
dcterms:title: MSP-Podcast corpus

dcterms:creator: L. Goncalves

dcterms:description: A dataset created for the Odyssey 2024 Speech Emotion Recognition Challenge, consisting of recordings used to classify speech segments into emotional categories and predict emotional attributes.
dcterms:title: Odyssey2024 Speech Emotion Recognition Challenge
